sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import React, {Component} from "react" import Play from "./play.js" let cards = [ {title: "Flinstone", src: "flinstone.png", clicks:0}, {title: "Homer", src: "./imgs/homer.jng", clicks:0}, {title: "patrick", src: "./imgs/patrick.jpeg", clicks:0}, {title: "peppapig", src: "./imgs/peppapig.webp", clicks:0}, {title: "pikachu", src: "./imgs/pikachu.jpg", clicks:0}, {title: "Buzz", src: "./imgs/buzz.jpg", clicks:0}, {title: "Mickey", src: "./imgs/mickey.jpeg", clicks:0}, {title: "Stewie", src: "./imgs/stewi.png", clicks:0}, {title: "Tom", src: "./imgs/tom.jpg", clicks:0}, {title: "Medieval", src: "./imgs/eye.avif", clicks:0}, {title: "Schulz", src: "./imgs/schulz.jpg", clicks:0}, {title: "Phineas", src: "./imgs/phineas.jpeg", clicks:0}, ] class App extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { score: 0, bestScore: 0 } } render() { return (

Wizards Memory Game

*Earn points by clicking on a picture, but don't click more than once*

Score: {this.state.score}

Best score: {this.state.bestScore}

) } } export default App;
